00034 const int64_t Hypertable::BEGINNING_OF_TIME = std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::min();
00035 const int64_t Hypertable::END_OF_TIME = std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max();

00037 RowInterval::RowInterval() : start(0), start_inclusive(true),
00038                              end(0), end_inclusive(true) { }
00039 
00040 size_t RowInterval::encoded_length() const {
00041   return 2 + encoded_length_vstr(start) + encoded_length_vstr(end);
00042 }
00043 
00044 void RowInterval::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00045   encode_vstr(bufp, start);
00046   encode_bool(bufp, start_inclusive);
00047   encode_vstr(bufp, end);
00048   encode_bool(bufp, end_inclusive);
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 void RowInterval::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00053   HT_TRY("decoding row interval",
00054     start = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00055     start_inclusive = decode_bool(bufp, remainp);
00056     end = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00057     end_inclusive = decode_bool(bufp, remainp));
00058 }
00059 
00060 CellInterval::CellInterval() : start_row(0), start_column(0), start_inclusive(true),
00061                                end_row(0), end_column(0), end_inclusive(true) { }
00062 
00063 size_t CellInterval::encoded_length() const {
00064   return 2 + encoded_length_vstr(start_row) + encoded_length_vstr(start_column) + encoded_length_vstr(end_row) + encoded_length_vstr(end_column);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void CellInterval::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00068   encode_vstr(bufp, start_row);
00069   encode_vstr(bufp, start_column);
00070   encode_bool(bufp, start_inclusive);
00071   encode_vstr(bufp, end_row);
00072   encode_vstr(bufp, end_column);
00073   encode_bool(bufp, end_inclusive);
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 void CellInterval::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00078   HT_TRY("decoding cell interval",
00079     start_row = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00080     start_column = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00081     start_inclusive = decode_bool(bufp, remainp);
00082     end_row = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00083     end_column = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00084     end_inclusive = decode_bool(bufp, remainp));
00085 }

00087 ScanSpec::ScanSpec() : row_limit(0), max_versions(0),
00088        time_interval(0, END_OF_TIME), return_deletes(false) {
00089 }
00090 
00091 size_t ScanSpec::encoded_length() const {
00092   size_t len = encoded_length_vi32(row_limit) +
00093                encoded_length_vi32(max_versions) +
00094                encoded_length_vi32(columns.size()) +
00095                encoded_length_vi32(row_intervals.size()) +
00096                encoded_length_vi32(cell_intervals.size());
00097   foreach(const char *c, columns) len += encoded_length_vstr(c);
00098   foreach(const RowInterval &ri, row_intervals) len += ri.encoded_length();
00099   foreach(const CellInterval &ci, cell_intervals) len += ci.encoded_length();
00100   return len + 8 + 8 + 1;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void ScanSpec::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00104   encode_vi32(bufp, row_limit);
00105   encode_vi32(bufp, max_versions);
00106   encode_vi32(bufp, columns.size());
00107   foreach(const char *c, columns) encode_vstr(bufp, c);
00108   encode_vi32(bufp, row_intervals.size());
00109   foreach(const RowInterval &ri, row_intervals) ri.encode(bufp);
00110   encode_vi32(bufp, cell_intervals.size());
00111   foreach(const CellInterval &ci, cell_intervals) ci.encode(bufp);
00112   encode_i64(bufp, time_interval.first);
00113   encode_i64(bufp, time_interval.second);
00114   encode_bool(bufp, return_deletes);
00115 }
00116 
00117 void ScanSpec::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00118   RowInterval ri;
00119   CellInterval ci;
00120   HT_TRY("decoding scan spec",
00121     row_limit = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp);
00122     max_versions = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp);
00123     for (size_t nc = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp); nc--;)
00124       columns.push_back(decode_vstr(bufp, remainp));
00125     for (size_t nri = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp); nri--;) {
00126       ri.decode(bufp, remainp);
00127       row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00128     }
00129     for (size_t nci = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp); nci--;) {
00130       ci.decode(bufp, remainp);
00131       cell_intervals.push_back(ci);
00132     }
00133     time_interval.first = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00134     time_interval.second = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00135     return_deletes = decode_i8(bufp, remainp));
00136 }

00139 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const RowInterval &ri) {
00140   os <<"{RowInterval: ";
00141   if (ri.start)
00142     os << "\"" << ri.start << "\"";
00143   else
00144     os << "NULL";
00145   if (ri.start_inclusive)
00146     os << " <= row ";
00147   else
00148     os << " < row ";
00149   if (ri.end_inclusive)
00150     os << "<= ";
00151   else
00152     os << "< ";
00153   if (ri.end)
00154     os << "\"" << ri.end << "\"";
00155   else
00156     os << "0xff 0xff";
00157   os << "}";
00158   return os;
00159 }
00160 
00161 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const CellInterval &ci) {
00162   os <<"{CellInterval: ";
00163   if (ci.start_row)
00164     os << "\"" << ci.start_row << "\",\"" << ci.start_column << "\"";
00165   else
00166     os << "NULL";
00167   if (ci.start_inclusive)
00168     os << " <= cell ";
00169   else
00170     os << " < cell ";
00171   if (ci.end_inclusive)
00172     os << "<= ";
00173   else
00174     os << "< ";
00175   if (ci.end_row)
00176     os << "\"" << ci.end_row << "\",\"" << ci.end_column << "\"";
00177   else
00178     os << "0xff 0xff";
00179   os << "}";
00180   return os;
00181 }

00183 
00184 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const ScanSpec &scan_spec) {
00185   os <<"\n{ScanSpec: row_limit="<< scan_spec.row_limit
00186      <<" max_versions="<< scan_spec.max_versions;
00187 
00188   if (!scan_spec.row_intervals.empty()) {
00189     os << "\n rows=";
00190     foreach(const RowInterval &ri, scan_spec.row_intervals)
00191       os << " " << ri;
00192   }
00193 
00194   if (!scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty()) {
00195     os << "\n cells=";
00196     foreach(const CellInterval &ci, scan_spec.cell_intervals)
00197       os << " " << ci;
00198   }
00199 
00200   if (!scan_spec.columns.empty()) {
00201     os << "\n columns=(";
00202     foreach (const char *c, scan_spec.columns)
00203       os <<"'"<< c << "' ";
00204     os <<')';
00205   }
00206 
00207   os <<"\n time_interval=(" << scan_spec.time_interval.first <<", "
00208      << scan_spec.time_interval.second <<")\n}\n";
00209   return os;
00210 }
